chart-group.description: Displays the number of updates filtered and received by the application server for each of the past 7 days.
chart-group.title: Updates for DAQ $CHART_NAME$

chart-group.description: This chart gives the breakdown of the reasons updates were filtered out at the DAQ layer over the past 7 days, for DAQ $CHART_NAME$.
chart-group.title: Breakdown of filtering reasons for DAQ $CHART_NAME$ over past 7 days

chart-group.description: This chart gives the breakdown of the quality of invalid tag updates filtered out at the DAQ layer over the last 7 days, for DAQ $CHART_NAME$.
chart-group.title: Quality of invalid updates filtered out for DAQ $CHART_NAME$ over past 7 days

chart-group.description: This chart shows the proportion of invalid updates received from the equipment over the past 7 days (more precisely, it calculates the proportion of invalid updates amongst updates to the AS and those filtered out.)
chart-group.title: Proportion of invalid updates for DAQ $CHART_NAME$ over past 7 days.

chart-group.description: This chart gives the breakdown of the quality of invalid tag values held by the application server over the last 7 days, for DAQ $CHART_NAME$.
chart-group.title: Quality of invalid updates to AS for DAQ $CHART_NAME$ over past 7 days

chart.paragraph-title: Breakdown of the filtering reasons for the DAQ.
chart.description: The DAQ layer filters out tag updates for a number of reasons. This chart shows the breakdown of the reasons updates were filtered out over the past 7 days.
chart.title: DAQ filtering reasons

chart.paragraph-title: Total updates sent to the Application Server for each of the past 10 days
chart.description: Shows the total number of tag updates sent to the application server for each of the past 10 days (these are the non-filtered values).
chart.title: Total updates to AS

chart.paragraph-title: Total updates filtered out at the DAQ layer for each of the past 10 days
chart.description: Shows the total number of tag updates filtered out at the DAQ layer for each of the past 10 days
chart.title: Total updates filtered at DAQ layer

chart.paragraph-title: Updates to the application server by DAQ.
chart.description: This chart shows the 30 DAQs that sent the most updates to the application server yesterday.
chart.title: DAQs to application server

chart.paragraph-title: For yesterday: breakdown of the activity of all DAQs.
chart.description: This chart shows the number of updates sent yesterday to the application server and filter module for each DAQ.
chart.title: Updates by DAQ

chart.paragraph-title: Behavior of P_CVRMTVENTLHC01 over the past 7 days
chart.description: This chart gives a breakdown of the tags sent by the DAQ P_CVRMTVENTLHC01 to the application server and filter module over the past 7 days.
chart.title: DAQ

chart.paragraph-title: Quality of the application server values for the DAQ.
chart.description: This chart gives a breakdown of the invalid quality codes for this DAQ over the past 7 days. The meaning of the quality codes is obtained by unique binary decomposition! (0=UNINITIALISED, 1=INACCESSIBLE, 2=VALUE_EXPIRED, 3=VALUE_OUT_OF_BOUNDS, 4=INVALID_TAG, 5=VALUE_UNDEFINED, 6=UNKNOWN)
chart.title: DAQ quality codes

chart.paragraph-title: Most out-of-bounds tags over past 7 days.
chart.description: Displays the tags with the highest proportion of out-of-bounds values arriving from the equipment over the past 7 days. May indicate badly configured min-max range.
chart.title: Top out-of-bounds percentages.

chart.description: Displays the tags with the highest proportion of invalid values arriving from the equipment over the last 7 days (only tags with at least 10 updates over this period are considered). May indicate badly configured tags.
chart.title: Top invalid percentages.

chart.paragraph-title: Most invalid tags: breakdown of invalidity
chart.description: This chart gives the breakdown of the invalidity codes for the tags in the "Top invalid percentages" chart, for those values sent to the application server (1=UNINITIALISED, 2=INACCESSIBLE, 4=VALUE_EXPIRED, 8=VALUE_OUT_OF_BOUNDS, 16=INVALID_TAG, 32=VALUE_UNDEFINED, 64=UNKNOWN).
chart.title: Quality code breakdown for top invalid tags.
chart.range-name: Percentage of values with the given quality code.

chart.title: DAQ P_ENS01
